name: Super Mega Ninja Death Strike 3000
description:
A 2d one hit one kill quick pace slash game

Controls: 

player 1 move with arrows attack with i jump with o

player 2 move with AD attack with r jump with t

Can wall jump and wall cling

Things to note:

no respond so must restart the game after a death. (Will be updated by 14Th) 

(play in full screen)

Here is a link to my blog to stay updated on the game
